message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity to get something truly special at a great value. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. Would you like to make it yours for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. To make this deal more attractive, how about we consider $100 for the product? Let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet in the middle at $95?
Considering your feedback, I believe we can come to an agreement at $97. This is a fair price considering the value the product offers. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $97. How about we try $92?

I understand your position, Bob. To finalize this transaction, how about we settle at $94? This price reflects the quality and value of the product, while also accommodating your budget. Let me know what you think.
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with $94. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $91?
Considering your latest offer, I believe we can reach an agreement at $93. This price respects both the value of the product and your budget. What do you think?

I'm really interested in the product, but I've been offered a better deal from another seller. I'm willing to meet you at $90, but that's my final offer. If I don't get it, I'll have to go with the other seller.
